name: hirewise
title: Hirewise
desc: A professional job board theme with modern polish.
article:
Hirewise is a dual-mode job board template for hiring platforms and career sites.


  • Learn more about Hirewise
  • Get the full access bundle including all premium themes and lifetime access: https://lexingtonthemes.com/

All Pages

  • Landing Page x3
  • About
  • Pricing
  • Team (CC)
  • Blog (CC)
  • Companies (CC)
  • Jobs board (CC)
  • Candidates (CC)
  • Help center (CC)
  • Legal pages (CC)
  • Reset password
  • Submit job
  • Submit company
  • Submit job offer
  • Contact
  • Sign in
  • Sign up
  • Error 404


(CC) = Content Collections

Features

  • Light and dark modes
  • Job board paywall
  • Blog Tags
  • Reusable components
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
